title: Confront the Elder Brain
content:
have Ketheric's Netherstone. Get Orin's Netherstone Get Gortash's Netherstone

Meet Gortash at the Morphic Pool.

Face the elder brain.

Talk to the Emperor.

Get a mind flayer on your side.

Face the Netherbrain again.

Get to the Netherbrain.

Reach the Crown of Karsus.

Enter the portal to the Netherbrain's psyche.

Bring the Netherbrain to heel.

Confront the Elder Brain Walkthrough

After you collected all three Nether stones. You can travel to Morphic Pool from Undercity Ruins. Before you
